mapper.sql: ID, POST_ID, START_ID, RECEIVE_ID, CONTENT, CREATE_TIME, IS_DEL
mapper.select: select co.ID, co.POST_ID, co.START_ID, wx.WX_NICK_NAME WXNAME, co.RECEIVE_ID, co.CONTENT, DATE_FORMAT(co.CREATE_TIME, '%Y.%m.%d %T') CREATE_TIME, co.IS_DEL from t_comment co left join t_wx_user wx on wx.USER_ID = co.START_ID where co.POST_ID = #{postId} and co.IS_DEL = 0 LIMIT #{offSet}, #{pageRow}
select count(0) from t_comment co left join t_wx_user wx on wx.USER_ID = co.START_ID where co.POST_ID = #{postId} and co.IS_DEL = 0
mapper.update: update t_comment set IS_DEL = 1 where ID = #{ID}
mapper.select: select co.ID, ba.CONTENT, co.POST_ID, co.IS_DEL, DATE_FORMAT(co.CREATE_TIME, '%Y.%m.%d %T') CREATE_TIME, DATE_FORMAT(co.SORT_TIME, '%Y.%m.%d %T') SORT_TIME from t_user_collection co left join t_post_base ba on co.POST_ID = ba.ID where co.USER_ID = #{userId} and co.IS_DEL = 0 ORDER BY co.SORT_TIME desc LIMIT #{offSet}, #{pageRow}
select count(0) from t_user_collection co left join t_post_base ba on co.POST_ID = ba.ID where co.USER_ID = #{userId} and co.IS_DEL = 0
mapper.update: update t_user_collection set IS_DEL = 1 where ID = #{ID}
mapper.select: select count(0) from t_user_operation_restrict where USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_user_operation_restrict (USER_ID, RESTRICT_STATE, RESTRICT_END_TIME) values (#{userId}, #{restrict}, #{endtime})
mapper.select: select DATE_FORMAT(RESTRICT_END_TIME, '%Y.%m.%d %T') endtime from t_user_operation_restrict where USER_ID = #{userId} and RESTRICT_STATE=1
